pages.text: The $(d)Spectre Key$() can be used to $(3)teleport to a private room in another dimension$(), unique to each player.$(br2)Once there, you can build and store items safely, and they'll remain there any time you return. Leave by either using the Key again, or clicking one of the Spectre Core blocks on the room's floor.
pages.title: Spectre Key

pages.text: The room has a floor of 16x16 blocks, and starts out only 2 blocks tall.$(br2)You can expand it vertically by using $(l:items/ectoplasm)Ectoplasm$(/l) on the Spectre Core blocks.$(br2)Each Ectoplasm increases the room's height by 1 block, and it will use the entire stack when clicked.
